name: Clicksanity
description:
This game was created by Ezra and me in 48 hours for TN Tech Game Dev Club Game Jam Fall 2022 https://itch.io/jam/tn-tech-game-dev-club-game-jam-fall-2022

The prompt was "Make a game out of a quote." Ezra and I chose "Insanity is doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results" which is attributed to Albert Einstein. 

Programmed in Godot, music made in Pico-8.

Check out Ezra's itch.io account: zanenab - itch.io
